Amenities At Our Boutique New York City Hotel

Everything You'll Need for a Comfortable Stay

At The Evelyn, our goal is to make every stay as comfortable and convenient as possible. Whether you are visiting New York City for the first time or are a regular business traveler to the area, you'll find that our New York boutique hotel's amenities provide everything you'll need for a comfortable stay.

Amenities At Our Boutique New York City Hotel:

  • 24-hour modern fitness center
  • Available upon request, $25 day passes to 24 Hour Fitness Ultra-Sport Gym located on 5th Avenue
  • Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi access
  • Complimentary lobby coffee from 7 am - 10 am
  • Complimentary early morning pastries
  • Concierge Service
  • Luggage Storage
  • Valet parking available with surcharges

In-Room Amenities:

  • Luxurious Frette linens and bathrobes, down comforter and Alberta plush mattress
  • iHome alarm clock radio with dual docks and USB port
  • Gramophone for iPhones in our Executive Suites
  • LG Flat-Panel HD LCD TV
  • Lefroy Brooks bathroom fixtures, walk-in rain showers with sliding rail handspray
  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities
  • Custom vanity with integrated mirror, marble sink and glass shelf
  • Table top multimedia hub on desks and USB ports access on headboards
  • Individually controlled air-conditioning and heating units
  • Laptop compatible safe with neon backlit digital display
  • Hair dryers, full-length mirrors
  • In-room fridge
